channel.title: Light Bow [First bow]
channel.description:
Well, Vivalabill added me on msn and we started talking, and he asked me to make a "Light Bow", the opposite of the "Dark Bow" so I gave it a shot, and here is what I came up with. Tell me what you think.
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/zkizqp.jpg[/img]

item.title: Light Bow [First bow]
item.dc:creator: @Guardianman5 Guardianman5
item.description:
@Guardianman5 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:13, topic:322454”][quote author=licorish55 link=topic=418862.msg3077929#msg3077929 date=1261968353]
Cardboard or not thats pretty cool.

And LilXCj, Don’t critisize others, really un-needed in modeling.
[/quote]
How can you honestly say criticism is UNNECESSARY? are you blind to common sense? anything made by man can use criticism. Humanity is in no way perfect, nor is anything we create. criticism is DEFINITELY necessary for a model…

Lets see some of your models?

Since when do you have to be amazing at something to be a good criticizer? im pretty sure that movie critics arent all people who make movies. Im honestly confused at how your mind works when it comes to criticism. If you write an essay, and someone criticized it, i much doubt you’ll say “its an essay, dont criticize it”. Think before you speak please.[/quote]

So is my model good or not? haha

Read full topic

item.title: Light Bow [First bow]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:13, topic:322454”][quote author=licorish55 link=topic=418862.msg3077929#msg3077929 date=1261968353]
Cardboard or not thats pretty cool.

And LilXCj, Don’t critisize others, really un-needed in modeling.
[/quote]
How can you honestly say criticism is UNNECESSARY? are you blind to common sense? anything made by man can use criticism. Humanity is in no way perfect, nor is anything we create. criticism is DEFINITELY necessary for a model…

Lets see some of your models?

Since when do you have to be amazing at something to be a good criticizer? im pretty sure that movie critics arent all people who make movies. Im honestly confused at how your mind works when it comes to criticism. If you write an essay, and someone criticized it, i much doubt you’ll say “its an essay, dont criticize it”. Think before you speak please.[/quote]
@dylan
Thanks.

@guardian
I suggest trying to use primitives, they’re much easier to make round shapes than tracing or hand drawing. You can make a cylinder pointed because it uses a point in the middle to create the circle, or you can just attach a cone to it. Whatever floats your boat. As for design, I give it a 7.5, I’d like to see a (little) more detail in it. To me it looks like two eyes are staring at me. I’m guessing they’re supposed to be orbs (or spheres, like, etched into the model details.).

Bending is the trickiest part about primitives. I’m barely figuring out how to do it, but it’s ending up nicely.

There’s my criticism.

licorish55:

Lets see some of your models?

I’ve only made 5 models.

  1. Masamune
  2. Avenger
  3. Pokeball
  4. Lyoko Sword Scroll down.
  5. Rocket

I’m obviously not the best modeler.

Read full topic

CoonHunter:

For a “Light” bow, its good, but i would suggest a more “Heavenly” shade of gold.

Ok, thanks alot.

item.title: Light Bow [First bow]
item.dc:creator: @Guardianman5 Guardianman5
item.description:
@Guardianman5 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:9, topic:322454”][quote author=Guardianman5 link=topic=418862.msg3077952#msg3077952 date=1261968841]

It’s just a suggestion. To help his models look better. Criticism is better than lying.
[/quote] I like it when people criticize, it lets me know the truth, I’d rather be told it’s the worst thing ever then be lied to and say it looks good, so thanks for the criticizum.

As Dylan says, Dont “Sugar” coat something and make it seem nice, when in reality, it could be shit.

@MODEL - Dont keep me as saying its shit, was trying to make a point, But umm, Yea, the over-all design is nice, it just needs to have some rounding and such for it.[/quote]

Ok, I’ll try to find out how to round it, and are the colors any good? My biggest problems are colors I never know which to use, and how to make them look good. Any suggestions on how to make better, or good color combos, etc.

Read full topic

@MODEL - Dont keep me as saying its shit, was trying to make a point, But umm, Yea, the over-all design is nice, it just needs to have some rounding and such for it.
